title: The best Google Pixel 8 Pro alternatives: 5 phones worth consider before you buy
description: Like the idea of the Pixel 8 Pro but wondering what else is out there? We've got you covered.

title: SpaceX’s Starlink set to launch satellite phone service in 2024
description: Starlink plans to expand its satellite phone service by adding global carriers in the future.

title: Need AI to generate an image? Just ask for what you want in Google Search.
description: You'll need access to Google's Search Generative Experience (SGE) for it to work, but this is dead simple otherwise.

title: OnePlus Open takes back seat to identical twin, to be announced hours later
description: The OPPO Find N3 and N3 Flip will launch 8.5 hours before the OnePlus Open.

title: The Galaxy Watch 5 LTE is cheaper than Prime Day at just $249.99
description: The 44mm LTE model of the Galaxy Watch 5 just hit an all-time low price with a 31% price drop.

title: Pixel 8 Pro earns best display title in new ranking
description: The base model Pixel 8 also received similarly high scores.

title: The most important Google Pixel Watch 2 questions, answered
description: You have questions, we have answers.

title: The OnePlus Open foldable will officially launch next week
description: The first OnePlus foldable will have its coming-out party on October 19.

title: The OnePlus 12 could beat the Pixel 8 Pro in this display spec
description: The display on the OnePlus 12 is now said to be a bigger 6.82-inch display with a peak brightness of 2,600 nits.

title: Google’s new Pixel Troubleshooting app is now available on the Pixel 8 series
description: The app can also be ported over to the Pixel 7 series.

title: Pixel 8 finally gets a beloved iPhone feature: eSIM conversion and transfer!
description: The Pixel 8 series comes with tools to let you migrate your eSIM from an old phone, and also convert a physical SIM to eSIM.

title: OnePlus Open doppelganger OPPO Find N3 now has a launch date
description: The two phones will be identical except for their marketing names.

title: We connected a Pixel 8 Pro to an iPhone 15 Pro via USB-C: Here’s what happened
description: Figuring out how the Pixel 8 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro will behave when connected over USB-C is like playing Russian Roulette.

title: How to stream local channels without a cable subscription
description: Cutting the cord doesn't have to mean losing access to local programming.

title: How to delete all your Facebook posts without deleting your account
description: Start with a clean slate on your Facebook profile.

title: Having trouble accessing Fitbit? That’s because the app is down
description: As of right now, the Fitbit app doesn't work for anyone.

title: LG’s 48-inch 4K gaming monitor is $700 off in the Big Deal Days Sale
description: From basic screens to gaming monitors and beyond, LG is discounting loads of monitors.
